de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.model.viewer

Class PhysicalElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.model.viewer.PhysicalElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<PhysicalElement>

    public class PhysicalElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<PhysicalElement>, java.io.Serializable
    Physical element (page) containing an image, video or audio.

        filePath - Path to the file

        orderLabel - Page number (label)
        urn - Page URN
        purlPart -
        pi - Record identifier
        mimeType - Page mime type
        dataRepository - Record date repository

      • getDisplayMimeType

        public java.lang.String getDisplayMimeType()
        For images, this returns the full mime-type as image/X, with X being the format which should be used for image display. This is png for png-images and jpeg for all other types.
        Returns:

        public boolean isDisplayPagePdfLink()
